articles.description: Dear Taurus, today, you will feel the need to have more. Maintain your calm and deal with all of this with a quiet and stable mind. Don't invest your money in new schemes or venture at all, you may incur losses in the future. | Horoscope
articles.content:
TAURUS (Apr 20- May 21)
Dear Taurus, you love luxury and are engulfed in attaining all materialistic desires at an early stage of life. At the same time, you also value contentment and your integrit… [+1985 chars]
